SK-DESTA.MX.long_name: Skandia Global Bond Fund SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
SK-DESTA.MX.summary: The objective of the Fund is to invest in assets whose nature corresponds mainly to securities of issuers Government, Bank and corporate, domestic and foreign debt and credit quality AAA and AA. Investment in these debt securities will be made exclusively by means of the acquisition of shares of domestic mutual funds, foreigners and/or ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds also known as TRACS). The weighted duration of the Fund can fluctuate significantly, following this the characteristic of being an active background in the management of its portfolio. Complementarily, the Fund may include national or foreign debt assets live with minimum rating of BBB.
SK-DESTA.MX.family: Old Mutual Operadora de Fondos SA de CV

SK-DESTB.MX.long_name: Skandia Global Bond Fund SA de CV S.I.I.D. B
SK-DESTB.MX.summary: The objective of the Fund is to invest in assets whose nature corresponds mainly to securities of issuers Government, Bank and corporate, domestic and foreign debt and credit quality AAA and AA. Investment in these debt securities will be made exclusively by means of the acquisition of shares of domestic mutual funds, foreigners and/or ETFs (Exchange Traded Funds also known as TRACS). The weighted duration of the Fund can fluctuate significantly, following this the characteristic of being an active background in the management of its portfolio. SK-DESTB.MX.family: Old Mutual Operadora de Fondos SA de CV

VECTPZOA.MX.short_name: VECTOR FONDOS SA DE CV VECTOR F
VECTPZOA.MX.long_name: Vector Fondo MDC SA de CV F.I.I.D A
VECTPZOA.MX.summary: The Fund seeks to provide investors an alternative of long-term investment, enabling them to optimize their resources or liquids, to form combinations with other funds of shortest time or in another class of assets. The Fund will seek at all times reach a profitability according to interest rates that prevail in the long run. The Fund will invest in direct debt securities or through investment companies.
